prompts: Create a cute ice-type Pokemon that has a fluffy appearance and small tusks.
Generate a small, brown Pokemon with a round body and distinctive stripes.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in cold environments with a warm, playful demeanor.
Design a tiny ground-type Pokemon with a soft exterior and an adorable nose.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a baby mammoth, with fur and a cheerful expression.
Give me a Pokemon that can burrow underground and has a love for snowy habitats.
Make a Pokemon with a unique combination of brown and pink colors, perfect for winter.
